full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR MI BRAD RAB 'BAR RDO RJE BDUD SDE'I DPUNG 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR MI ZAD RAB 'BAR RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RGYA GZHUNG GI CHOS SKOR LAS, GRUB CHEN ZHVA LU PA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA 'DI NI 'GRO BA MA LUS PA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAMS RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
